article: davos , switzerland , jan ## -lrb- afp -rrb- nato secretary-general lord robertson on monday played down a split between top members of the alliance over iraq , with france and germany at loggerheads with the united states over a possible military intervention in iraq .
abstract: nato chief plays down split between top members over iraq
